japanese:
あ、そうです。
らいはちゃんも一緒に行きませんか？
translation:
Ah, that's right.
Why don't we take Raiha-chan along with us?

japanese:
らいはも？
いや、しかし旅費が。
translation:
Raiha too?
Well, I'm concerned about travel expenses.

japanese:
細かいことは気にしないでください。
私が連れて行きたいんですから。
translation:
Don't worry about the details.
I want to take her with us.

japanese: その、なんと言いますか、もう家族同然ですし。
translation: Well, she is like family to me, after all.

japanese: ……そうか、なららいはも頼む。
translation: ...I see. In that case, please bring Raiha too.

japanese: なに２人で真っ赤になってるのよ。
translation: What are you two blushing about?

japanese:
（仕方ないだろ！
　五月の奴、自分で言い出しておいて赤くなるし！）
translation:
(There's no way out!
 Even Itsuki blushes when she says it herself!)

japanese:
家族同然だなんて、
返事を散々待たせたくせに気が早いわねぇ。
translation:
You were so quick to say that they're like family,
but you sure took your time to answer him before.

japanese:
ま、待たせてしまったのは、結婚のことまで
ちゃんと考えて返事をしたからです！
translation:
W-well, I took my time with my response
because I was considering marriage!
...Huh?

japanese: はっ！！
translation: AH!!

japanese:
そっかそっかー、そうだったねー。
めちゃくちゃ悩んでたもん、五月ちゃん。
translation:
Oh, I see, I see. That's how it was.
You were really agonizing over it, weren't you,
Itsuki-chan.

japanese: 五月はどんな時でも真面目で一生懸命だからね。
translation: That's because Itsuki is so serious at trying her best at all times.

japanese:
わ、私、ちょっと用事を思い出しましたっ！
失礼しますっ！
translation:
I-I, uh, just remembered something I have to do!
Excuse me!

japanese:
五月、どうどう。
落ち着いて。
translation:
Itsuki, whoa.
Calm down.

japanese: う、うう……。
translation: Oo-ooohh...

japanese:
（そうか、五月はそこまでの覚悟で
　俺に向き合ってくれたのか）
translation:
(Oh, I see,
 Itsuki was prepared to face me to that extent.)

japanese:
（だったら俺も、五月の覚悟に
　きっちり向き合っていかなければ）
translation:
(If that's the case, then I must also face Itsuki's
 determination properly.)

japanese:
（それはわかってるんだが、
　五月との仲は、告白した時から
　大して進展していないんだよな……）
translation:
(I know that, and yet the relationship between Itsuki
 and I hasn't really progressed since I confessed...)

japanese:
（俺も五月も受験があったわけで、
　正直、余裕なんてなかったんだが）
translation:
(Both of us had exams, and honestly,
 we didn't have any spare time.)

japanese:
（だが、受験が終わったとはいえ、
　俺が上京する以上、ここから先は
　いわゆる遠距離恋愛を余儀なくされるんだ）
translation:
(Not only that, with exams being over and me
 moving to Tokyo, we're going to be in a
 so-called long-distance relationship.)

japanese:
（互いに覚悟があるとはいえ、
　恋愛初心者同士の遠距離恋愛……
　正直言って不安しかない）
translation:
(Although we are both determined, a long-distance
 relationship between two people who are inexperienced
 in love... It honestly makes me worry.)

japanese:
（だから、この旅行を通して
　五月との絆をもっと深めたい。
　そのためにも……！）
translation:
(That's why, on this trip, I want to deepen my bond
 with Itsuki even more.
 And for that reason...!)

japanese: （この旅行中に！　俺からキスをする！！）
translation: (During this trip! I will KISS HER!!)

japanese:
（まあ逆を言えば
　キスすらまだだってことなんだが……）
translation:
(Well, in other words,
 we haven't actually kissed yet...)

japanese: （上杉風太郎、ここが勝負の時だっ！）
translation:
(Time for the games to begin,
 Uesugi Futaro!!)
